channel.title: Forum Mafia Sniper! It wasn't canned. Everyone just died except 1 person
channel.description:
#### Hello. I am Firekitten the fluffy litten. there is probably another idea similar to this but I wanted a simple idea so here it is. My Co-Host is @Memesky
#### Rules. 1.No angle shooting 2.Be a little active (not as active as me if you want to not be blacklisted :sob:) 3.Don't be a bully (I SHALL NOT TOLERATE ANY MEAN PEOPLE HERE. THEY CAN GO TO **** FOR ALL I CARE!!! #### Class Limits Only two of each class can spawn that is not a vanilla town. #### Snipers and how they work. For a sniper to snipe someone they do in their PM'S **/SNIPE (TARGET)**. Then if they are not immune to snipers they die.
#### Day And Night Cycle Days last 72 hours and night last 24 hours.
#### Role List
[details="RoleList"] [color=LIgreen]Cop Doctor Archer Random Town Random Town Vanilia Townie/Random Town Vanilla Town Vanilia Town Vanilia Town [/color][color=Red]Godfather Sharpshooter Mafia Goon Mafia Goon[/color] [color=grey]Sniper Survivor Lyncher[/color] [/details]
#### Class Cards [details="Town"] >**[Color=LiGreen]Archer[/color]** **Day Ability**-Kill a player in the day time-1 use **Goal:** Defeat the mafia and any neutrals who seek to do you harm.
>**[Color=LiGreen]Doctor[/color]** **Night Ability**-Heal someone from attacks-3 uses **Goal:** Defeat the mafia and any neutrals who seek to do you harm.
>**[Color=LiGreen]Cop[/color]** **Night Ability**-Determine if a player is a member of the mafia-2 uses **Goal:** Defeat the mafia and any neutrals who seek to do you harm.
>**[Color=LiGreen]Vanilla Town[/color]** **Passive-Powerless**-You have no abilities. **Goal:** Defeat the mafia and any neutrals who seek to do you harm. [/details]
[details="Mafia"] >**[Color=red]Godfather[/color]** **Passive-Business Guy**-You appear NS to all checks against you. You may vote on who to kill with the factional kill. **Goal:** Defeat the town and any neutrals who dare stand in your way.
>**[Color=red]Sharpshooter[/color]** **Passive-SemiPowerless**-You can vote on who to kill with the factional kill. **Day Ability-Sniped**-Snipe someone killing them instantly-1 use. **Goal:** Defeat the town and any neutrals who dare stand in your way.
>**[Color=red]Mafia Goon[/color]** **Passive-Powerless**-You have no abilities. You can vote on who to kill with the factional kill. **Goal:** Defeat the town and any neutrals who dare stand in your way. [/details]
[details="Neutral"] >**[color=grey]Sniper[/color]** **Passive-Bullet Proof**-Immune to snipers and death at night. **Day Ability-Sniped**-Snipe someone killing them instantly-Unlimited Uses **Goal:** Kill everyone that isn't a neutral
>**[color=grey]Survivor[/color]** **Passive-Semi Bullet Proof**-Immune to Snipers- **Night Ability-Bullet Proof Vest**- Gain Death Immunity Tonight-3 uses. **Goal:** Survive.
>**[color=grey]Lyncher[/color]** **Passive-Bulletproof**-Immune To Snipers And Death At Night. **Goal:** Get X lynched at all cost. If X is killed N1. You get a new target. [/details]
#### Player List 1.Htm 2.Celeste 3.Captain 4.Max 5.Hippo 6.Joker 7.Marl 8.Ashe 9.Psy 10.Pug 11.Boss 12.Shade 13.Squid 14.post 15.Sam 16.Cheese
#### Spectators 1. 2. 3. 4. 5.
#### Blacklist No one cause I am not mean like others :sob:
Grave Yard Marl-Vanilla Townie Shot D1. Psy-Lyncher Lynched D1. Ashe-Mafia goon-Shot D2
